message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and truly offers unparalleled value. Given its worth to you, I believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true value to both of us. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $10800. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a significant discount. I look forward to your positive response.
